Description: Lip sherd of Attic pottery band-cup; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: lip glazed, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ10
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.2.12)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0514) (Phase 1)
